text: Frances Hesselbein (November 1, 1915 - December 11, 2022) was an American businesswoman. She served as the CEO of the Girl Scouts of the USA from 1976 to 1990. In 1998, she was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom for her work with the Girl Scouts of the USA. Hesselbein was born in Johnstown, Pennsylvania. She turned 100 in 2015. She died at her home in Easton, Pennsylvania, on December 11, 2022, at the age of 107. ==References== ==Other websites== * Frances Hesselbein Leadership Institute Category:1915 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:People from Johnstown, Pennsylvania Category:Presidential Medal of Freedom recipients
title: Frances Hesselbein
